title: mastery 6 bug?
body:
It requires 1 owned cassiopeia, but i have already bought her. How i can unlock by 1 owned cassiopeia without shards and blue essence or random rerolls?
[img1](https://gyazo.com/c79418796ee60ce536ee1699df6b6c0a) [img2](https://gyazo.com/8850cd3e1bbd6066bd53c0d3b8d58825)

replies.body: ok got this... just trying to get this mastery like a year, anyway thx

A Cassiopeia permanent is like 3 shards that's been rerolled.  You would get a permanent in cases where you rerolled a champion you already had unlocked.  Upgrading the mastery level is referencing a hextech ingredient, and not whether or not you have the champion unlocked.  Let me know if that clears things up!

i want to unlock mastery by 1 owned cassiopeia, but it says i dont have her. 1 cassio permanent = 1 owned cassio?

Negative.  

1 Cassio Permanent = 3 re-rolled champion shards that turned into a permanent item.

1 owned Cassio = 1 unlocked cassio on your account and not impacted by this hextech crafting token system.

Owning her does not mean you have a Permanent hextech item.  It would appear in your Hextech Crafting loot, but you do not have one.  

Check out our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, specifically the Permanent section, which provides more information and pictures as well.  I hope that helps clear things up but let me know.
